mapper.select: select * from ( select A.MEMBERNO, A.MEMBERID, A.MEMBERPW, A.MEMBERNICKNAME, A.MEMBEREMAIL, A.MEMBERPHONE, A.MEMBERDO, A.MEMBERCITY, A.MEMBERADDR, A.MEMBERROLE, A.MEMBERPROHIBITCOUNT, A.MEMBERPROHIBITTIME, A.MEMBERPROHIBITCHK, A.MEMBERJOIN, A.MEMBERSMS, A.MEMBERLOGOUTTIME, ROWNUM AS RN from ( select * from MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBERNO DESC) A where ROWNUM <= #{endPost}) X where X.RN >= #{startPost} ORDER BY X.MEMBERNO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GG WHERE GGWRITER = #{memberNickName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FWLB WHERE FWLBWRITER = #{memberNickName}

select * from ( select A.GGNO, A.GGROWNUM, A.GGWRITER, A.GGTITLE, A.GGCONT, A.GGREADCNT, A.GGDATE, ROWNUM AS RN from ( select * from GG WHERE GGWRITER = #{memberNickName} ORDER BY GGNO DESC) A where ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(#{endPost})) X where X.RN >= TO_NUMBER(#{startPost}) ORDER BY X.GGNO desc

select * from ( select A.FWLBNO, A.FWLBWRITER, A.FWLBTITLE, A.FWLBREADCNT, A.FWLBDATE, ROWNUM AS RN from ( select * from FWLB WHERE FWLBWRITER = #{memberNickName} ORDER BY FWLBNO DESC) A where ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(#{endPost})) X where X.RN >= TO_NUMBER(#{startPost}) ORDER BY X.FWLBNO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBERPROHIBITCOUNT = MEMBERPROHIBITCOUNT+1 WHERE MEMBERNICKNAME=#{memberNickName}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBERPROHIBITCHK = 'Y' WHERE MEMBERNICKNAME=#{memberNickName}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBERPROHIBITTIME = #{memberProhibitTime} WHERE MEMBERNICKNAME=#{memberNickname}
